mapper.insert: insert into seorak_myBookList( member_id, mylist_no, mylist_url, mylist_img_url, isbn, mylist_title, mylist_publisher, mylist_author, reg_date ) values ( 'seorakbooks@gmail.com', s_mylist_no.nextval, #{myBookListUrl}, #{myBookListImgUrl}, #{isbn}, #{myBookListTitle}, #{myBookListPublisher}, #{myBookListAuthor}, #{regDate} )
